eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Gem; Ada; Valley; Boise, ID; at 09:01 AM ON JAN 22, 2026 Effective until 11:01 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system.  The Gem County Sheriffs Office is looking for a missing person and is believed to be in danger. He is a 77 year old male with gray hair and was last seen wearing a green thermal shirt jeans black coat tan and white Crocs. He may be suffering from dementia and may be confused. Authorities say that the missing person may be traveling in a 2012 tan Ford F one fifty with Idaho plate D U 9 0 7. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9  1  1 immediately or call Gem County Sheriff 2 0 8 3 6 5 3 5 2 1
